text.0: he like a bull with sharpened horns terrific singly excites and agitates all the people.
text.1: thou givest him who largely pours libations his goods who pours not for his own possession.
text.2: thou verily indra gavest help to kutsa willingly giving car to him in battle.
text.3: when aiding Ārjuneya thou subduedst to him both kuyava and the dāsa Śuṣṇa.
text.4: o bold one thou with all thine aids hast boldly holpen sudās whose offerings were accepted.
text.5: pūru in winning land and slaying foemen and trasadasyu son of purukutsa.
text.6: at the gods banquet herosouled with heroes lord of bay steeds thou slewest many foemen.
text.7: thou sentest in swift death to sleep the dasyu both cumuri and dhuni for dabhīti.
text.8: these were thy mighty powers that thunderwielder thou swiftly crushedst nineandninety castles.
text.9: thou capturedst the hundredth in thine onslaught thou slewest namuci thou slewest vṛtra.
text.10: old are the blessings indra which thou gavest sudās the worshipper who brought oblations.
text.11: for thee the strong i yoke thy strong bay horses may our prayers reach thee and win strength most mighty.
text.12: give us not up lord of bay horses victor in this thine own assembly to the wicked.
text.13: deliver us with true and faithful succours dear may we be to thee among the princes.
text.14: may we men maghavan the friends thou lovest near thee be joyful under thy protection.
text.15: fain to fulfil the wish of atithigva humble the pride of turvaśa and yadva.
text.16: swiftly in truth o maghavan about thee men skilled in hymning sing their songs and praises.
text.17: elect us also into their assembly who by their calls on thee despoiled the niggards.
text.18: thine are these lauds o manliest of heroes lauds which revert to us and give us riches.
text.19: favour these indra when they fight with faemen as friend and hero and the heroes helper.
text.20: now lauded for thine aid heroic indra sped by our prayer wax mighty in thy body.
text.21: apportion to us strength and habitations ye gods protect us evermore with blessings.
